item.title: HR exec caught on Coldplay cam resigns after embrace with CEO went viral
item.description: Kristin Cabot, an executive at tech company Astronomer, has resigned after a viral video showed her embracing CEO Andy Byron at a Coldplay concert

item.title: A bull moose is blocking a New York mountain trail. Wildlife researchers don't know why
item.description: New York wildlife officials have closed a trail in the Adirondack Mountains this summer due to a bull moose lingering around the area

item.title: Columbia genocide scholar may leave over university's new antisemitism definition
item.description: Academics around the country are raising alarm about growing efforts to define antisemitism on terms pushed by the Trump administration

item.title: Disgraced former US Rep. George Santos to begin serving his 7-year fraud sentence
item.description: Disgraced former U.S. Rep. George Santos is set to begin serving a seven-year prison sentence for the fraud charges that got him ousted from Congress

item.title: Lori Vallow Daybell to be sentenced on Arizona convictions, signaling end to legal saga
item.description: A mother with doomsday religious beliefs is set to be sentenced Friday on murder conspiracy convictions in Arizona
